name: Ragdoll Test
description:
You are a ragdoll in a world full of constantly spawning objects.

I made this game while learning godot, the game is just a test.
The game is crashing sometimes, caused by the engine, not the game itself.
I wont spend any more time on this crapy app if it aren't a special case.
Have fun!

To get fly: find all 20 blue coins
To phys catch/throwing: find all  20 red coins.

Controls:Walk:W,S,A,DJumpSpaceRun:   CTRL (hold)Fall/FeilFRespawn ENTERFirst/Third player viewGFlyShift (hold)Catch/hold objectLeft clickThrow objectRight click

Note: If the antivirus is warning, it is because this game is new / unknown it's just to ignore it.
